newsitem.title: USA: Tivoli fiscal year revs, backlog rise.
newsitem.headline: Tivoli fiscal year revs, backlog rise.

text.p: Tivoli Industries Inc Tuesday said sales for its fiscal year ended September 30 rose 46 percent to about $6.6 million from $4.5 million a year ago.

Unaudited sales backlog at September 30, 1996, stood at a record $500,000, about 75 percent above the backlog levels from the same period a year ago. Complete audited results for the year ended September 30 will be released in November.
